REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2856 reute h f BC-DATA-ARCHITECTS-<DRCH 04-09 0052

TEXT.TITLE: DATA ARCHITECTS <DRCH> TO MAKE OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Data Architects inc said it intends to make a public offering of 850,000 shares of its common stock, of which 672,000 shares will be sold by the company and 178,000 by certain shareholders. Proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes. Reuter
